item.name: Apps

request.description: Get information about a specific Amazon Pinpoint app.
Get information about the apps in your Amazon Pinpoint account.
Delete an existing Amazon Pinpoint application.

item.description: API operations related to managing Amazon Pinpoint projects (apps).

request.description: Creates or updates a campaign in an Amazon Pinpoint project.
Deletes an existing campaign.
Get information about a specific Amazon Pinpoint campaign.
Get information about the activities associated with a specific campaign.
Get information about all of the campaigns in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Get information about a specific version of a campaign.
Returns information about your campaign versions.

request.description: Update an existing Amazon Pinpoint campaign.

item.description: API operations related to managing Amazon Pinpoint campaigns.

request.description: Disable the ADM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the ADM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the ADM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the APNs channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the APNS channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the APNs channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the APNs sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the APNS sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the APNs sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the APNs VoIP channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the APNS VoIP channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the APNs VoIP channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the APNs VoIP sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the APNS VoIP sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the APNs VoIP sandbox channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the Baidu channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the Baidu channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the Baidu channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the Email channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the email channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the email channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the GCM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the GCM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the GCM channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Disable the SMS channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project. Amazon Pinpoint saves the settings for the SMS channel in the event that you want to enable it again later.
Get information about the settings for the SMS channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Update the settings for the SMS channel in a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Delete a specific endpoint in an Amazon Pinpoint project.
Get information about a specific endpoint.
Create or update an endpoint in an Amazon Pinpoint project.
Create or update several endpoints in an Amazon Pinpoint project. You can use this operation to create up to 100 endpoints in a single call to the API.
Record events and associate them with endpoints. Note: Despite its name, this operation uses the POST method.
Delete an Amazon Pinpoint event stream.
Get information about an event stream for a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Create or update the event streaming configuration for a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Create a new export job.
Get information about a specific export job.
Get information about the export jobs for a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Get information about the import jobs for a specific Amazon Pinpoint project.
Get information about a specific import job.
Create or update an import job.
Send SMS, email, or mobile push messages to endpoints, without creating segments or campaigns.
Send SMS, email, or mobile push messages to all of the endpoints that are associated with a specific User ID.
Convert an incoming phone number into E.164 format, and get metadata for the phone number.
Create a new segment.
Delete a specific segment.
Get information about a specific segment.
Get a list of import jobs for a specific segment.
Get a list of export jobs for a specific segment.
Get information about a specific version of a segment.
Provides a list of versions for a specific segment.
Get information about all of the segments in an Amazon Pinpoint project.
Modify the attributes of an existing segment.

item.name: Settings

request.description: Get information about the settings for a specific Amazon Pinpoint app.
Update the settings for a specific Amazon Pinpoint app.

item.description: Manage the default settings for an Amazon Pinpoint project.

request.description: Add tags to existing Amazon Pinpoint resources, such as projects, campaigns, or segments.
Remove tags from existing Amazon Pinpoint resources, such as projects, campaigns, or segments.
Delete all of the endpoints that are associated with a specific user ID.
Get information about all of the endpoints that are associated with a specific user ID.
